title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 202.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 202.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

It is the policy of the state, as stated in N-PCL section
1501, "to prevent cemeteries from falling into disrepair and dilapidation and
becoming a burden upon the community." The Cemetery Board has adopted these
rules and regulations to set forth procedures to involve all stakeholders
early-on to avoid abandonment, and to determine that a cemetery has become
abandoned. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
202.1

Adopted

New

York State Register March 9, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 10, eff. 3/9/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
